about_the_game:
This is the story of a bandit, specifically a female bandit named Yuma. She obtained an ability she didn't ask for. Now Yuma can manipulate people by entering their bodies. How can she rid herself of this unfortunate power and not lose herself in the process?

It's the first war of the Continent. North and South, plains and mountains - Yuma must navigate through all of this in her adventure



  • Study the souls of others. You can temporarily move into the body of another person and find out what he really is.
  • Hide behind a mask, learn to improvise - get important information while in the bodies of other people, try not to reveal yourself when talking!
  • Analyze and overcome. The location has many unique items that can lead you to the goal. Find a way to fool everyone and go unnoticed.
[/list]

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz and up

  • Graphics: Integrated with 128mb of vram

short_description: Play as Yuma, a girl thief who has gained the ability to inhabit people. In an attempt to save her people, she uses other people's secrets and weaknesses. But finding the strength to fight for freedom is not such an easy task when you are haunted by inner voices.
